dct_title_s: Χάρτης οδίκου δίκτυου και διοικητικών διαιρέσεων της Ελλάδος (Front)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints. Recto shows northern Greece. Verso shows southern Greece. Map shows five classes of roads, administrative boundaries, railroads, shipping lines, populated places, and distances between ports. Recto includes four tables listing size of principal lakes, islands, rivers, and mountains in Greece. Verso includes distance table in kilometers. "Hē synthesē egine apo chartes kl. 1:250.000 tēs GYS kai symplērōthēke apo ta kalitera diathesima stoicheia." = "Compiled by HMGS from maps of scale 1:250.000 and completed from the best available sources."
dct_publisher_sm: Athēnai : Geōgraphikē Hypēresia Stratou (Hellenic Military Geographical Service), 1997.
